text: Ropica honesta is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Pascoe in 1865. It is known from Borneo, Sumatra, Java, New Guinea, the Philippines, and China.BioLib.cz - Ropica honesta. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ropica (genus) Category:Beetles described in 1865
title: Ropica honesta
